page.title: 09CHILDREN'S GAMES(HOPSKOTCH)
page.content: Hopskotch is a game you can play with any amount of players.Every player needs a stone and one child needs a piece of chalk.A hopskotch is one square on the first line,the second line has 2 squares and so on until there are ten squares. You put one number in each square and that is the drawing of the hopskotch completed. Then the first player throws their stone and its got to land on the first square then you jump over the first square and land on square 2 and 3.And do that all the way down the line.
